trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGZB106_05046_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Zarwarkur hopes you are hungry for knowledge.
TEXT_KINGZB106_05046_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the tulidile meat to Zarwarkur.
TEXT_KINGZB106_05046_ZARWARKUR_000_000<tab>Well met, traveler! By the look of you, I presume you know how to hunt, yes? Would you be interested to learn how we prepare our traditional jerky?
TEXT_KINGZB106_05046_ZARWARKUR_000_001<tab>In exchange, all I ask is that you supply the main ingredient, as my stock is running low.
TEXT_KINGZB106_05046_ZARWARKUR_000_002<tab>For this, we will require tulidile meat. Head north of our village and look for a specimen worthy of salting!
TEXT_KINGZB106_05046_ZARWARKUR_000_005<tab>You should be able to find tulidiles in their natural habitat just north of here. Best of luck!
TEXT_KINGZB106_05046_ZARWARKUR_000_011<tab>Oooh, now there's a beautiful slab! Barely any fat to trim. A quick coating of salt and we should be well on our way to some mouthwatering jerky!
TEXT_KINGZB106_05046_ZARWARKUR_000_012<tab>The key, you see, is to lay the meat strips in a well-lit area with cool, dry air. Good thing we're on top of a mountain, eh?

TEXT_KINGZB106_05046_ZARWARKUR_000_013<tab>The Dawnservant himself once tasted my jerky many years ago. The Head of Resolve liked it so much, he wolfed it down in moments! <chuckle> I can still recall the Head of Reason's look of disgust. “Must you inhale it!?”

TEXT_KINGZB106_05046_ZARWARKUR_000_014<tab>Ah, but this is no time to reminisce about the old days. There is work to be done, and this tulidile meat will make a scrumptious jerky with just the right amount of chew.
TEXT_KINGZB106_05046_ZARWARKUR_000_015<tab>While you were hunting, I cooked you a little treat for later. Consider it your payment for replenishing my stock!
